attributes.action: Ban Radio Controlled Nitro and Petrol cars
attributes.additional_details: Ban these un- environmental products from the U.K., they burn almost neat fuel, cause excessive noise, tear up the countryside, ruin peoples peace at weekends with there bee in a bottle noise, cause plumes of blue smoke in fields. All of the parts are made unregulated abroad and are dangerous. No licence is required for these, the frequency also interferes with non-digital emergency bands  such as coast guards and mountain rescue.
